OB: When the preference dialog for File Editors is opened, the 'OK' button is enabled even when no selection is made.
EB: The 'OK' button should only be enabled when a selection is made in the File Editors preference page.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the preferences page for File Editors. 2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, switch to the 'External Editors' section and select an entry. 3. Switch back to Internal Editors. The 'OK' button should still be disabled. 4. Press 'OK'. This adds the selected external editor without any selection in the Internal Editors section.
